knimeNode.name: PFA Predictor
knimeNode.shortDescription: Applies a PFA scoring engine to a KNIME table.

fullDescription.intro: For more information please visit the DMG PFA website. Supported primitive types are: boolean, int, long, float, double, string. Supported complex types are: Records, Maps, Union (Union types are used for nullable types in PFA. Other use cases are currently not supported).
fullDescription.option: If the output is a record or a map, then there is no need to set the column name, since it will be automatically set according to the column names from the PFA document. If the output is a primitive type (e.g. boolean, int), then this value will be used as column name.

ports.inPort: The PFA Model to use for making predictions. Type of the port is PFAPortObject.
The data table to make predictions for. Type of the port is BufferedDataTable.
ports.outPort: The output of the PFA scoring engine as a data table. Type of the port is BufferedDataTable.
